title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Kenya 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
GDP growth compared to previous year is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018, and lastly roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 6.32 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 4.86 was reached at Year 2017
